position: Marketing at VdoCipher  | Ex. Bikeshala & Software Engineer at HCL

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Created and SEO Optimized Bikeshala’s Blogs and Product catalogue text content like descriptions, meta description, title, page title and image alt text.Added “Product” and “Article” schema by structuring information like title, image, description, price and timestamp into various rich result structured data format.Used tools like Google Analytics, Keyword planner, Search Console and Semrush to monitor traffic and finding keyword gaps.Did Instagram profile research to gather leads (users) for further engagement and onboarding.Created Social Media Ad campaigns on Instagram and Facebook using Facebook Business Manager.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: I started my career with HCL Technologies as Software Engineer and worked for client - UNHCR Managed Services.Resolved priority level UNHCR Geneva Global Tickets through Ivanti/Landesk Tool support as per standard procedures.Authored and reviewed UNHCR Ivanti Technical Workflow Documentation to be followed within the HCL Noida UNHCR 40-member team.Created Monthly Review Meeting Presentation - ‘Collaborative & Communicate’ for discussion with UNHCR Global Team Members.Proved successful working within high priority deadlines for tickets causing business outage and exceeded goalsthrough task prioritization.Performed upgrades, installations and tuned existing Ivanti System.
